sentences.sentence: The book fell open at a page of illustrations.
sentences.translation: 书翻开在有插图的那一页。

sentences.sentence: It is worthwhile to include really high-quality illustrations.
sentences.translation: 把真正高质量的插图包括进去是值得的。

sentences.sentence: She not only wrote the text but also selected the illustrations.
sentences.translation: 她不仅写了正文部分，而且还挑选了插图。
